emanuele-f/PCAPdroid

Track, analyze, and block network connections on Android without root

View on index

Related repos

  • Android app for wireless and hardware security testing, inspired by Flipper Zero
  • Android app for capturing and analyzing NFC traffic
  • Static analysis for Android apps based on the OWASP MASVS framework
  • Intercepts and analyzes traffic from mobile devices
  • Android firewall app for blocking internet access per app
  • Mirrors and controls Android devices via USB or TCP/IP
  • Monitors network traffic across platforms
  • network firewall and privacy tool for monitoring and blocking app connections
  • Scans network for intruders and monitors device connections
